pt: {sc}spacious{/sc} {sc}commodious{/sc} {sc}capacious{/sc} {sc}ample{/sc} mean larger in extent or capacity than the average. {sc}spacious{/sc} implies great length and breadth.
{sc}capacious{/sc} stresses the ability to hold, contain, or retain more than the average.
{sc}ample{/sc} implies having a greater size, expanse, or amount than that deemed adequate.

et: Middle English, fertile, useful, modification of Medieval Latin {it}commodosus{/it}, from Latin {it}commodum{/it} convenience, from neuter of {it}commodus{/it}
